code: import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DragFilesComponent=()=>{const[files,setFiles]=useState(null);const inputRef=useRef();const handleDragOver=event=>{event.preventDefault();};const handleDrop=event=>{event.preventDefault();setFiles(event.dataTransfer.files);};const handleUpload=()=>{const formData=new FormData();Array.from(files).forEach(file=>formData.append("Files",file));console.log(formData.getAll("Files"));};useEffect(()=>{console.log("Hello");},[files]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:files?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:Array.from(files).map((file,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:file.name},idx))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"px-5 py-2",onClick:()=>setFiles(null),children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"px-5 py-2",onClick:handleUpload,children:"Upload"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center h-screen",onDragOver:handleDragOver,onDrop:handleDrop,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Drag and Drop Files to Upload"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Or"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",multiple:true,onChange:event=>setFiles(event.target.files),hidden:true,ref:inputRef})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>inputRef.current.click(),children:"Browse"})})]})});};export default DragFilesComponent;
